artist: Artist: Gerhard Marcks; Publisher: Müller & Co. Verlag, Potsdam, Germany; Printer: Staatliches Bauhaus
creditline: Gift of the Print and Drawing Curatorial Council in memory of Marianne Baird Wallman
description: two cats walking toward L; striped cat in foreground carries a mouse; cat in background has spots and turns to face out of picture plane; small insect at L edge
portfolio: From From Bauhaus-Drucke. Neue Europäische Graphik. Erste Mappe: Staatliches Bauhaus, Weimar, Germany, 1920-21
provenance: (Catherine E. Burns Fine Prints and Drawings, Oakland, Calif.); sold to MIA, 2003.
signed: LLC, in two areas, in pencil: [Gerhard Marcks 1921]
title: Cats
